title: Despite Coronavirus, These 22 Fastest-Growing Companies Expect 25%-150% Growth In 2020
summary:
Yet as the stock market rebounds, some of the fastest-growing companies, like Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), Netflix (NFLX), Nvidia (NVDA), Zoom Video Communications (ZM) and Dropbox (DBX), are still expecting big earnings growth in 2020.
XGSX Techedu (GSX) and Quidel (QDEL) lead this list of the fastest-growing companies, with analysts EPS growth estimates for this year of 150% and 126%, respectively.
Analysts also expect strong earnings growth in 2020 from Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX) (65%), AMD (59%), Netflix (56%) and Dropbox (46%).
NFLX, VRTX and NOW are also on the IBD 50, IBD Big Cap 20 and Sector Leaders.
NVDA, DBX, AMD and newer IPO stocks ZM, Palomar (PLMR) and Tradeweb Markets (TW) have also made various IBD growth screens.
text:
The coronavirus pandemic has shut down or disrupted economies all over the world. Yet as the stock market rebounds, some of the fastest-growing companies, like Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), Netflix (NFLX), Nvidia (NVDA), Zoom Video Communications (ZM) and Dropbox (DBX), are still expecting big earnings growth in 2020.

X

GSX Techedu (GSX) and Quidel (QDEL) lead this list of the fastest-growing companies, with analysts EPS growth estimates for this year of 150% and 126%, respectively.

Analysts also expect strong earnings growth in 2020 from Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX) (65%), AMD (59%), Netflix (56%) and Dropbox (46%).

Many of these stocks to watch listed here are also on other IBD screens. NFLX, VRTX and NOW are also on the IBD 50, IBD Big Cap 20 and Sector Leaders. ServiceNow is also on IBD Long-Term Leaders.

NVDA, DBX, AMD and newer IPO stocks ZM, Palomar (PLMR) and Tradeweb Markets (TW) have also made various IBD growth screens.

Fastest-Growing Companies In 2020

<article class="clearfix post-5869520 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-research tag-cloud-computing-cloud-stocks tag-ipo-news tag-netflix-stock-news prim_stock_symbol-amd prim_stock_symbol-nflx prim_stock_symbol-now prim_stock_symbol-dbx prim_stock_symbol-vrtx article_type-staffarticle distribution_rights-distribute">

<ul class="post-categories">
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/category/research/" rel="category tag">Research</a></li></ul> <h1 class="header1">
Despite Coronavirus, These 22 Fastest-Growing Companies Expect 25%-150% Growth In 2020	</h1>
<div class="featured-post-image-container"></div>
<div class="addtoany_share_save_container addtoany_content_top row">
<div class="share">
<div class="a2a_kit a2a_kit_size_25 addtoany_list" data-a2a-url="https://www.investors.com/research/fastest-growing-companies-2020-despite-coronavirus/" data-a2a-title="Despite Coronavirus, These 22 Fastest-Growing Companies Expect 25%-150% Growth In 2020"><a class="a2a_button_facebook" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/facebook?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Ffastest-growing-companies-2020-despite-coronavirus%2F&linkname=Despite%20Coronavirus%2C%20These%2022%20Fastest-Growing%20Companies%20Expect%2025%25-150%25%20Growth%20In%202020" title="Facebook" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/facebook.png" width="25" height="25" alt="Facebook"></a><a class="a2a_button_twitter" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/twitter?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Ffastest-growing-companies-2020-despite-coronavirus%2F&linkname=Despite%20Coronavirus%2C%20These%2022%20Fastest-Growing%20Companies%20Expect%2025%25-150%25%20Growth%20In%202020" title="Twitter" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/twitter.png" width="25" height="25" alt="Twitter"></a><a class="a2a_button_linkedin" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/linkedin?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Ffastest-growing-companies-2020-despite-coronavirus%2F&linkname=Despite%20Coronavirus%2C%20These%2022%20Fastest-Growing%20Companies%20Expect%2025%25-150%25%20Growth%20In%202020" title="LinkedIn" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/linkedin.png" width="25" height="25" alt="LinkedIn"></a><a class="a2a_dd addtoany_share_save addtoany_share" href="https://www.addtoany.com/share"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/email.png" alt="Share"></a></div> <a class="reprints-button sharing" href="https://www.ibdlicensing.com" target="_blank">Licensing</a>
</div>
<ul class="post-meta">
<li><span class="authors-links"><a href="https://www.investors.com/author/galganim/" title="Posts by MATTHEW GALGANI" class="author url fn" rel="author">MATTHEW GALGANI</a></span></li>
<li class="post-time">12:29 PM ET 05/28/2020</li>
</ul>
</div>
</header>
<div class="single-post-content post-content drop-cap">
<p>The coronavirus pandemic has shut down or disrupted economies all over the world. Yet as the stock market rebounds, some of the fastest-growing companies, like <strong>Advanced Micro Devices</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=AMD' target='_blank'>AMD</a>), <strong>Netflix</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=NFLX' target='_blank'>NFLX</a>), <strong>Nvidia</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=NVDA' target='_blank'>NVDA</a>), <strong>Zoom Video Communications</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=ZM' target='_blank'>ZM</a>) and <strong>Dropbox</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=DBX' target='_blank'>DBX</a>), are still expecting big earnings growth in 2020.</p>
<span>
<span style="width:50%;" class="video-player-container vms-left">
<span class="shortcode-video" vid-id="4233330" vid-dom-id="4233330-5ed70ce90ffa5" vid-top="false" vid-repeat="1" vid-width="50" vid-url="https://content.jwplatform.com/manifests/8kD8XbEB.m3u8" data-captions="[{"name":"English","url":"https:\/\/content.jwplatform.com\/tracks\/SyaNJYo4.vtt"}]" vid-name="How To Make Money In Stocks With IBD" vid-cat="Learn How To Trade Stocks Using Research Tools" vid-date="02/11/2019" vid-image="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/IBD_Difference_T-640x360.jpg" vid-authors="MATTHEW GALGANI">
<span class="close-mini-vid">X</span>
<span id="shortcode-video-player-4233330-5ed70ce90ffa5" class="ready-to-load"></span>
</span>
</span>
</span><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https:\/\/schema.org","@type":"VideoObject","name":"How To Make Money In Stocks With IBD","description":"See what makes IBD different from other investing sites, and how you can use it to profitably invest in stocks.","thumbnailUrl":"https:\/\/www.investors.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/02\/IBD_Difference_T-640x360.jpg","contentUrl":"https:\/\/content.jwplatform.com\/manifests\/8kD8XbEB.m3u8","uploadDate":"2019-02-11T07:31:01+0000","duration":"PT109.61S","author":"MATTHEW GALGANI","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Investor's Business Daily","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https:\/\/www.investors.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2020\/06\/ibd-logo.png"},"url":"https:\/\/www.investors.com"},"keywords":""}</script>
<p><strong>GSX Techedu</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=GSX' target='_blank'>GSX</a>) and <strong>Quidel</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=QDEL' target='_blank'>QDEL</a>) lead this list of the fastest-growing companies, with analysts EPS growth estimates for this year of 150% and 126%, respectively.</p>
<p>Analysts also expect strong earnings growth in 2020 from <strong>Vertex Pharmaceuticals</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=VRTX' target='_blank'>VRTX</a>) (65%), AMD (59%), Netflix (56%) and Dropbox (46%).</p>
<p>Many of these stocks to watch listed here are also on other <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/sp500-beating-lists-find-next-apple-amazon/">IBD screens</a>. NFLX, VRTX and NOW are also on the <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/ibd-50/">IBD 50</a>, <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/big-cap-20/">IBD Big Cap 20</a> and <a href="https://research.investors.com/stock-lists/sector-leaders">Sector Leaders</a>. ServiceNow is also on <a href="https://www.investors.com/research/ibd-long-term-leaders-screen/">IBD Long-Term Leaders</a>.</p>
<p>NVDA, DBX, AMD and newer <a href="https://www.investors.com/research/ipo-stock-news-and-analysis-find-todays-top-new-issues/">IPO stocks</a> ZM, <strong>Palomar</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=PLMR' target='_blank'>PLMR</a>) and <strong>Tradeweb Markets</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=TW' target='_blank'>TW</a>) have also made various IBD growth screens.</p>
